entry.title: Dapper Labs Sets Launch Date for LaLiga Golazos NFT Marketplace
entry.summary: Like NBA Top Shot and NFL All Day, the Flow-based platform will serve up NFT collectibles based on notable video highlights.

entry.title: Europe Bans All Crypto Wallet Services to Russia in New Sanctions Package
entry.summary: The European Union has placed a blanket ban on crypto services to Russian entities as part of its eighth round of sanctions.

entry.title: Controversial Bitcoin Miner Greenidge Generation Looks to Raise $22.8 Million
entry.summary: Despite lower profitability and hefty criticism from environmental activists, Bitcoin mining firm Greenidge is eyeing fresh funding.

entry.title: 'Key Aide' to Terra's Do Kwon Arrested by South Korean Authorities: Report
entry.summary: South Korean authorities have reportedly made the first arrest in the ongoing investigation of the Terra ecosystem collapse.

entry.title: SUSHI Jumps 14% After Asset Manager GoldenTree Reveals $5.3M Stake in SushiSwap
entry.summary: Big money’s involvement has lifted investor confidence, but it also raises questions as to just how decentralized SushiSwap really is.

entry.title: Water Labbu Malware Targets Scammers to Steal Their Ill-Gotten Crypto
entry.summary: Security specialists discovered another malware that loots crypto wallets. This time, though, it's robbing scammers of their ill-gotten funds.

entry.title: South Korean Authorities Officially Void Do Kwon’s Passport
entry.summary: Terra’s Do Kwon has14 days to surrender his passport to authorities. This is just the latest in the ongoing search for the crypto founder.

entry.title: Former SEC Attorney: 'It's Much Easier If You Launch Your Network In a Compliant Way’
entry.summary: The problem, according to Teresa Guillén, is launching without first receiving legal guidance or advice.

entry.title: JPEGs Are 'Not the Future of Web3 and NFTs': Polygon Studios Metaverse Lead
entry.summary: Polygon’s Brian Trunzo sees a broader array of NFT use cases taking hold in the future, from fashion to gaming and beyond.

entry.title: Yuga Labs Forms Bored Ape Community Council—But Not Everyone in Community Approves
entry.summary: The company appointed seven holders of the coveted Ethereum NFTs to help manage community feedback.

entry.title: Russia Blocks Access to Crypto Exchange OKX
entry.summary: The move continues Russia's history of mixed signals on crypto.

entry.title: Three Arrows’ CryptoPunks and Other 'Starry Night' Ethereum NFTs Set to Be Liquidated
entry.summary: The Starry Night Capital NFT fund is now in the hands of liquidators, which plan to sell off the assets to cover Three Arrows’ obligations.

entry.title: Mythical Games Enlists Ubisoft, Animoca, Others to Launch Web3 Gaming DAO and Token
entry.summary: Watch out, Yuga. Mythos and the MYTH token are coming.

entry.title: After 2 Years of Debate, Europe Finalizes Landmark Crypto Rules
entry.summary: “This marks the end of a heated but necessary discussion between the EU co-legislators,” said the European Crypto Initiative on today’s news.

entry.title: Terra's Do Kwon Denies Reports That Authorities Froze $39.6M of His Crypto
entry.summary: "I don't know whose funds they've frozen, but good for them," Terra co-founder Do Kwon wrote on Twitter.

entry.title: SEC Cracks Down on Multimillion Crypto Ponzi Targeting Latino Investors
entry.summary: Mauricio Chavez and Giorgio Benvenuto allegedly scooped $12 million through a crypto Ponzi, spending much of the money on a lavish lifestyle.

entry.title: Coinbase Incorporates in Australia, Expands Offerings for Retail Customers
entry.summary: Cryptocurrency exchange Coinbase is expanding its services in Australia, which it described as “a hotbed of fintech innovation.”

entry.title: Bitcoin Holds Steady Above $20,000 as Enthusiasts Rally Around 'Uptober' Meme
entry.summary: A popular meme on Twitter, hopes that the Fed will slow rate hikes, and historical data points to a potentially bullish month for Bitcoin.

entry.title: Co-Founder of Bankrupt Crypto Firm Celsius Daniel Leon Resigns: Report
entry.summary: Another executive of the bankrupt crypto lending firm Celsius has stepped down after a slew of financial and legal issues.

entry.title: Balcony DAO Co-Founder: There Are Clear Rules, People in Crypto Just Don't Like Them
entry.summary: John Belitsky says Balcony DAO is complying with existing SEC guidelines to get its security token approved.

entry.title: Actor Scott Eastwood Is Giving Away Ethereum NFTs for Charity—If You Chug a Beer
entry.summary: The “Suicide Squad” star and son of Clint Eastwood shared why he was hesitant to jump into crypto—and what changed his mind.

entry.title: Three Arrows Capital’s Premium Ethereum NFT Collection Is on the Move
entry.summary: The insolvent crypto hedge fund’s Starry Night Capital NFT collection is being transferred into a new Ethereum wallet.

entry.title: Near Protocol Founder: Ukraine Shows How Crypto 'Delivers Help Directly to People'
entry.summary: Millions in cryptocurrency have flooded into the region since the Russian invasion.

entry.title: Coinbase 'Very Supportive' of Giving CFTC Exclusive Jurisdiction Over Bitcoin, Ethereum
entry.summary: Coinbase Head of U.S. Policy Kara Calvert says the exchange is supportive of two bills in Congress that would allow the CFTC to take the reins on crypto regulation.

entry.title: Fidelity Reveals $5 Million Ethereum Index Fund
entry.summary: Unlike Exchange Traded Funds (ETFs), Index Funds only trade after hours at fixed prices.

entry.title: The DeFi Governance Conundrum: Synthetix Founder Kain Warwick at SmartCon 2022
entry.summary: Synthetix founder Kain Warwick spoke with Decrypt's Dan Roberts all about DeFi governance and its challenges, his problems with voting platforms like Snapshot, DAO fatigue, regulation and the SEC, and stablecoins onstage at Chainlink SmartCon 2022.

entry.title: Ubisoft, Take-Two Back Ethereum NFT Game Maker Horizon in $40M Round
entry.summary: Skyweaver game developer Horizon just raised a Series A round with a pair of Web3-friendly video game giants onboard.

entry.title: Dogecoin Pumps as Elon Musk Agrees (Again) to Buy Twitter
entry.summary: The memecoin surged over 8% on news Tuesday that the billionaire is indeed willing to purchase Twitter at $54.20 per share.

entry.title: How Armanino Audits Crypto Reserves: Clayton Lowery at SmartCon 2022
entry.summary: Clayton Lowery of Armanino LLP joins Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about how Armanino conducts its "proof of reserves" audits of crypto lenders like Nexo, how to foresee the next crypto company meltdown, trust in Tether, and scrutiny of stablecoins.

entry.title: Investors Flee Gold and Bitcoin, Pushing Correlation to New 12-Month High
entry.summary: Investors are fleeing from both the precious yell metal and Bitcoin, attracted by a strong dollar and high bond yields.

entry.title: Stablecoins Add 'Novel Vulnerabilities' to Crypto, Financial Stability: NY Fed
entry.summary: Greater interoperability among stablecoins could mitigate financial stability risks, a new paper by the Bank of New York argues.

entry.title: VeeFriends Toys Coming to Macy’s, Toys'R'Us as Ethereum NFT Brand Expands
entry.summary: Gary Vee’s NFT project has evolved from hand-drawn doodles to polished cartoon creatures—and now toys for the masses.

entry.title: Long Line of Bidders 'Expected' for Crypto Lender Celsius' Assets: Court Filing
entry.summary: Though no parties have confirmed their intention to bid for Celsius' assets, FTX’s Sam Bankman-Fried is a likely potential suitor.

entry.title: DeFi Tokens in Chainlink, Lido Finance, MakerDAO Jump 7%
entry.summary: New updates for Chainlink, post-merge improvements for Lido, and Maker’s impressive revenues have helped these DeFi tokens take flight.

entry.title: Payments Giant Mastercard Launches Cryptocurrency Anti-Fraud Tool for Card Issuers
entry.summary: Mastercard’s Crypto Secure product helps banks to determine the risk of crime associated with crypto exchanges on its payment network.

entry.title: 'Appropriate Regulation' Needed Over Crypto, Government Report Recommends
entry.summary: The 124-page report concludes that crypto-assets, including stablecoins and cryptocurrency exchanges, need more regulation.

entry.title: TIME President on NFT Haters: ‘I Don’t Understand the Politicizing of a Technology’
entry.summary: Many thought Keith Grossman was crazy for getting TIME into Web3. Now, he’s generated over $10 million in profit and revitalized an analog brand.

entry.title: How Worried Are Ethereum Devs About Safety at Devcon Bogotá?
entry.summary: Ethereum core developers responded to rumors swirling Monday about security concerns at the network’s marquee Devcon conference, set to kick off in Colombia’s capital next week.

entry.title: NFT Monthly Sales Top $947M as Solana Gains Ground on Ethereum
entry.summary: Solana NFT sales volume nearly doubled last month as the wider market remains largely flat—down roughly 82% from January highs.

entry.title: Moonbirds DAO to Launch With $2.6M in Ethereum and NFTs From Kevin Rose’s Proof
entry.summary: The Moonbirds DAO will let members vote on proposals that expand the growing ecosystem around the popular Ethereum NFT project.

entry.title: NYDIG, Under New Management, Bets Another $720M on Bitcoin
entry.summary: Amid major changes in leadership, NYDIG adds to $190 million raised in 2020 for its Bitcoin fund.

entry.title: Blockchain Builders Need Bug Bounty Programs: Immunefi Engineer
entry.summary: The popular bug bounty platform recently raised $24 million to guard user funds across Ethereum and Solana blockchains.

entry.title: Crypto Policy Crystal Ball: Coinbase, Haun Ventures, and Crypto Council for Innovation at Mainnet 2022
entry.summary: Regulation and policy is going to be the factor that most meaningfully shapes the crypto industry in the next few years. On a panel at Messari Mainnet 2022, Coinbase US policy chief Kara Calvert, Haun Ventures chief policy officer Tomicah Tillemann, and Crypto Council for Innovation CEO Sheila Warren gazed into the policy crystal ball with Decrypt's Dan Roberts.

entry.title: Why NEAR Founder Illia Polosukhin Is Bullish on Sweatcoin and Other Social Dapps
entry.summary: Near Protocol founder Illia Polosukhin joins Decrypt's Dan Roberts in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 to talk about what's being built on Near's blockchain, real-life use cases for DeFi including Sweatcoin, and how crypto continues to help Ukraine, where Polosukhin is from.

entry.title: How DeFi Chain Is 'Bringing DeFi Back to Bitcoin': DeFi Chain Accelerator Founder
entry.summary: Santiago Sabater, founder of DeFi Chain Accelerator, joins Decrypt's Dan Roberts in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 to talk about how DeFi Chain supports smart contracts on a proof-of-stake fork of the Bitcoin blockchain.

entry.title: How Gitcoin Has Given Millions of Dollars in Crypto to Worthy Projects: Azeem Khan at Mainnet 2022
entry.summary: Gitcoin's fundraising and partnerships lead Azeem Khan tells Decrypt's Andrew Hayward and Liam Kelly in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 about how Gitcoin grants work, the importance of community voting, and continuing to give out grants even through the bear market.

entry.title: Synthetix Founder Kain Warwick: Regulation Will Fork DeFi Projects Into Two Camps
entry.summary: Synthetix founder Kain Warwick joins Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Liam Kelly in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 to give his views on regulation and the SEC, how DeFi projects will split between compliant and non-compliant and that it's "ideologically confusing" but "not necessarily a bad thing."

entry.title: Bringing Institutions to Crypto: Christine Moy of Apollo, David Mercer of LMAX at SALT NY
entry.summary: Christine Moy of Apollo Global, formerly of JPMorgan, and David Mercer of LMAX, joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts onstage at SALT NY for a talk on institutional crypto investing and what hurdles remain to broader adoption amid the crypto bear market.

entry.title: Polygon Studios Metaverse Lead: JPEGs Are 'Not the Future of Web3 and NFTs'
entry.summary: Brian Trunzo, metaverse lead at Polygon Studios, tells Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 why he's bullish on metaverse fashion, how big brands are thinking about it, why the future of NFTs will be in gaming and not "right-click save JPEGs," and why he doesn't think the visual graphics of the metaverse need to dramatically improve necessarily.

entry.title: Balcony DAO Is Fractionalizing Investment in a New Jersey Building as an NFT
entry.summary: Balcony DAO co-founder John Belitsky tells Decrypt's Dan Roberts at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 how Balcony DAO is fractionalizing real estate investment using NFTs starting with 20 Third Avenue in Long Branch, NJ, and why it's waiting to launch its token as a registered security with the SEC.

entry.title: Fantom Foundation CEO: Multiple Blockchains Will Succeed—But Not 20 of Them
entry.summary: Fantom Foundation CEO Michael Kong tells Decrypt's Dan Roberts at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 how the Layer-1 blockchain competes with Ethereum and other chains, how it's a multi-chain future, how people misunderstood what the Ethereum merge was going to mean, and how to onboard more people into Web3.

entry.title: Why Izzy Howell Left Solana Derivatives Protocol Cypher to Launch an NFT Apparel Brand
entry.summary: Izzy Howell, a former core contributor at Solana derivatives protocol Cypher, tells Decrypt's Dan Roberts at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 what she's up to now: a streetwear and lifestyle brand called PussyDAO that will soon launch Solana NFTs tied to physical apparel.

entry.title: Meghan Heintz of Dune Analytics: Crypto Bear Market Makes the Scammers Move On
entry.summary: Meghan Heintz, data scientist at Dune Analytics, tells Decrypt's Dan Roberts at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 how Dune works, how its user-created data dashboards have a social element, the surprising benefit of the crypto bear market, and what she says to crypto skeptics.

entry.title: Prasanna Loganathar of Cake DeFi: Biggest Misconception About Crypto Is It's Less Safe Than TradFi
entry.summary: Prasanna Loganathar is the head of engineering at Cake DeFi, which is built atop DeFi Chain, a proof-of-stake network for dapps built on a fork of the Bitcoin blockchain. He tells Decrypt’s Jason Nelson in our Decrypting Mainnet booth at Mainnet 2022 (sponsored by DeFi Chain) about how DeFi Chain works, how it's possible to layer proof-of-stake on top of Bitcoin, and the biggest misconceptions about DeFi that he'd like to see go away in 2023.

entry.title: Polygon Co-Founder Talks Imminent Launch of zkEVM at Mainnet 2022
entry.summary: Polygon co-founder Mihailo Bjelic tells Decrypt's Liam Kelly and Kate Irwin in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 about why Polygon zkEVM will be the future of Ethereum scaling, how Polygon is "an un-opinionated platform" and how the Ethereum merge affected Polygon.

entry.title: Framework Ventures Co-Founder: Gaming Is Going to Bring 100 Million New People Into Web3
entry.summary: Framework Ventures co-founder Michael Anderson told Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Jason Nelson in our Decrypting Mainnet booth at Messari Mainnet 2022 why Framework is so bullish on blockchain gaming, NFTs in games, and how that's positioned to be the category that brings crypto to mainstream consumers.

entry.title: Jonas Surmann of DeFi Chain at Mainnet 2022: How DeFi Will Weather Crypto Winter
entry.summary: Jonas Surmann, ambassador for DeFi Chain, sponsor of the Decrypting Mainnet booth at Messari Mainnet 2022, tells Decrypt’s Dan Roberts and Sander Lutz about why DeFi will weather the crypto winter, how DeFi Chain is building decentralized apps on top of the Bitcoin blockchain, and what could happen with regulation if the SEC views most DeFi tokens as securities.

entry.title: Microsoft's Blockchain Lead: 'Developers Keep Building in a Bear Market, They Don't Stop'
entry.summary: Microsoft's blockchain lead Yorke Rhodes tells Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Kate Irwin in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 about how Microsoft approaches Web3 and how it began its blockchain tooling with Ethereum but is now looking into working on other chains. "We think about it from a portfolio perspective, you're not focused on pushing one thing, you're focused on pushing a whole portfolio... we don't like to be kingmakers."

entry.title: Tiffany Huang of Magic Eden: 'Ethereum People Are Paying a Lot of Attention to Solana NFTs'
entry.summary: NFT marketplace Magic Eden content head Tiffany Huang tells Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Andrew Hayward in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 about how Magic Eden's expansion to Ethereum has gone, how Solana NFTs have gained share of the overall NFT market, why she thinks even Ethereum people are paying more attention to Solana NFTs,

entry.title: Crypto Investor Matthew Graham: 'The LARPers Are Gone' Thanks to Bear Market
entry.summary: Sino Global Capital CEO Matthew Graham, a longtime crypto investor, joins Decrypt's Dan Roberts in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 to talk about investment choices during the bear market, DeFi growth prospects, how crypto needs to do a better job of "encouraging good actors and being vocal when people are doing something not sustainable."
